ygData.subject: Re: rocks
ygData.msgSnippet: Just shoot the rocks?  You try destroying over half the rocks in something as large as scenario #1 if it is pretty full of rocks.  You can not destroy enough

To: gladiator@egroups.com
Subject: Re: rocks
Message-ID: <92gpu8+897f@...>

MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 1343
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: "dph of rules " <dph_of_rules@...>

Just shoot the rocks?  You try destroying over half the rocks in 
something as large as scenario #1 if it is pretty full of rocks.  You 
can not destroy enough of them to make dent in the situation I was 
dealing with (that was with less than 100 elves).  Heck, I had level 
1023 doors (the highest level number doors you can have without 
getting error messages) protecting almost all of the scenario (except 
for walls) and left very little room for elves to appear.  They opened 
every door and my fire elementals did not have a prayer.

What does it take to destroy a large slime with one blow?  I do not 
mean make the slime lose one size.  I have had slime that manage to 
grow just in time to avoid being killed if they were small.  I am 
talking about exploding arrows.  No matter how powerfull I have had of 
an archer, no archer I have had can seemingly take out a large slime 
with 1 exploding bolt.  If the slime is good, you can waste all kinds 
of magic energy without killing the stupid [seeming indestructible] 
slime.  Or maybe that only happens with friendly fire?

--- In gladiator@egroups.com, "Tom Tildrum" <Tevildo@h...> wrote:
> Dude, you can just shoot the rocks and they disappear.
> _________________________________________________________________
